snippet.title: Egress Action Trailer
snippet.description:
Egress is a multiplayer souls-like PvP arena in a universe created based on G.F. Lovecraft. 
Choose one of many characters, each of which has unique features and gameplay. Fight on the streets of Insmouth Island with monsters, madmen and other adventurers! 
Decide who you want to support - desperate Explorers, crazy Bandits, manic Mercenaries or brave Sentinels! 
Find powerful mystical artifacts, understand what is happening and determine the fate of this world! 
But do not forget that your true enemy is sleeping in the depths of the sea ...

You can also follow us here:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EgressGame/ 
VK: https://vk.com/egressgame 
Egress official website: http://playegress.com/Store 
Discord channel: https://discord.gg/xPgsFtM 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playegress
